REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1378 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-16 0074

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN 90 MLN STG EARLY HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it provided the money market with assistance worth 90 mln stg in response to an early round of bill offers from discount houses. Earlier, the bank estimated the shortage in the system today at some 1.05 billion stg. The bank bought bills for resale to the market in equal amounts on April 1, 2 and 3 at an interest rate of 10-7/16 pct. REUTER
